docs.title: Welcome to NTCIR Agentic Instruction Task
docs.text:
Stay in touch

  • Follow @agenticinstruct for latest updates
  • Join our Discord server for quick questions and chats
  • Email Task organiser for any enquiries: agenticinstruction-org at googlegroups dot com

Task Organiser

Hideo Joho (University of Tsukuba)
